detail_desc: Oversized jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Loafers in imitation leather with pointed toes. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, jetted side pockets and an inner pocket. Sturdy ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Mesh lining.
Loose-fitting sleeveless top in crinkled cotton with a V-neck and pleats at the top. Lace insets at the hem and lace trims around the neckline, armholes and hem.

Mesh body with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Adjustable, double shoulder straps, a horizontal strap at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short dress in woven fabric with short, voluminous puff sleeves. Opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and a gathered seam at the waist.
Wide top in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, pin-tucks front and back and overlocked edges. Longer at the back.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Body in soft jersey with a print motif on the front in a narrow cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted jumper in a soft, patterned knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves.

Long windbreaker in airy, rustly nylon with visible seams. High, drawstring collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a drawstring that can be used to shorten them. Seam with a drawstring at the waist, flap side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a concealed zip at the back, 3/4-length sleeves with inset, hemstitched trims at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist, frills at the top and medium coverage at the back.
Cap-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with gathered side seams for best fit.
Platform boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seams and chunky soles. Height of soles 4.5 cm. Heel 5 cm.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Long raglan sleeves with mesh details. Seamless.

Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Sports vest top in ribbed fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Relaxed-fit shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Short-sleeved shirt in washed linen with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Polo-neck jumper in a textured knit with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Knee-length satin skirt with a high waist with wide elastication and a detachable tie belt, and side pockets. Unlined.

Lightly padded puffer jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets, inner pockets and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Recycled polyester filling.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and tapered legs with creases.
Jersey hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, fitted cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Grosgrain-covered Alice band with bat appliqués.
Long-sleeved sweatshirt in a lightweight cotton blend with cut-out sections on the shoulders, a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Longjohns in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed stretch denim with a belt-like tab at the front, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and raw-edge, frayed hem.
Short, boxy blouse in a softly draping viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and slits in the sides.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with frayed, raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the sleeves and reflective details.

Denim shorts with a regular waist and button fly. Side pockets, a coin pocket with a button and three back pockets, one of which is a welt pocket with a button. Straight legs with shaping seams that have longer hems at the front. Straight fit.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Shirt in soft, gently draping silk with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Waist belt in soft imitation leather that ties at the front. Width 8 cm, length 220 cm.
Cap in a patterned weave with an appliqué on the front and mesh back with an adjustable plastic fastener.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and slits in the sides of the hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck, lace details at the front, and smocking and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Ribbed vest top in soft cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the armholes and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Backpack in nylon with a roll-top opening with an adjustable tab and plastic fastener. Handle at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a padded back plate in mesh. Lined. Size 14x27x46 cm.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
5-pocket jeggings in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a short-sleeved dress and pair of puff shorts in a crinkled, organic cotton weave. Dress with a sailor collar and buttons down the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined.
Dress in printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and a seam and flared flounce at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck top in a supersoft, fine-knit viscose blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and lace trim at the hem. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Short skirt with a zip in one side and an adjustable belt with a metal fastener at the waist. Lined.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back.
Ankle-length dungarees in cotton denim with buttons at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Three-part chest pocket, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.
Calf-length pleated dress in airy chiffon in a double layer at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Sleeveless top in softly draping jersey with a scalloped edge around the neckline and armholes, and a small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck.
Calf-length dress in softly draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wide A-line skirt. Lined over the bust.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with a sweetheart neckline and concealed zip at the back. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and a close fit at the cuffs with a concealed zip. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave containing some wool with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
T-shirt bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Metal rings in various designs. Five of the rings are decorated with stone-look beads.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a concealed drawstring under the bust. Lined. Polyester filling.
Jumper knitted in a soft, textured wool blend with long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a rounded hem.
Batik-patterned cap in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a print motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Set with a top and pair of dungarees in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Hair scrunchies in elasticated fabric.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and fake back pockets. Straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Short shorts in airy Tencel™ lyocell twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides, overlocked frilled edges and a gathered seam at the back.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
